register.name: SCU_CONTROL
register.comment: SCU Control Register - bit 0 is SCU Enable

register.name: SCU_CONFIG
register.comment: SCU Configuration Register - contains info about the SCU setup.

register.name: SCU_POWER_STATE
register.comment: Specifies the state of the Cortex-R7 processors with reference to power modes.

register.name: SCU_INVALIDATE_ALL
register.comment: Invalidates the SCU tag RAMs on a per Cortex-R7 processor and per way basis.

register.name: SCU_AXI1_FILTER_START_ADDRESS
register.comment: Provides the start address for use with master port 1 in a two-master port configuration. Only bits 31:20 are valid.

register.name: SCU_AXI1_FILTER_END_ADDRESS
register.comment: Provides the end address for use with master port 1 in a two-master port configuration. Only bits 31:20 are valid.

register.name: SCU_PERI_FILTER_START_ADDRESS
register.comment: Provides the start address for use with AXI peripherals port. Only bits 31:20 are valid.

register.name: SCU_PERI_FILTER_END_ADDRESS
register.comment: Provides the end address for use with AXI peripherals port. Only bits 31:20 are valid.

register.name: SCU_ACCESS_CONTROL
register.comment: Controls access to the following registers on a per processor basis: * SCU Control Register on page 9-6. * SCU CPU Power Status Register on page 9-9. * SCU Invalidate All Register on page 9-10. * SCU Error Bank First Entry Register on page 9-14. * SCU Error Bank Second Entry Register on page 9-15.
